item.title: 标普 500 指数在 2024 年表现强劲后，明年底涨幅将超过 8
item.description: 路透社对股票策略师进行的一项调查显示，随着美国降息以及当选总统唐纳德-特朗普可能减少监管，从现在到 2025 年底，美国 500 指数将上涨 8%以上，从而延续市场的强劲走势。【原文：The S&P 500 will rise over 8% between now and end-2025 as U.S. interest rate cuts and potentially less regulation under President-elect Donald Trump extend the market's strong run, according to a Reuters poll of equity strategists.】

item.title: 假日需求强劲，Abercrombie & Fitch上调年度销售预期
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch 周二上调了年度销售预期，看好其同名品牌和以青少年为主的 Hollister 品牌的强劲需求。【原文：Abercrombie & Fitch lifted its annual sales forecast on Tuesday, betting on strong demand at its namesake label and its teen-focused Hollister brand.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 VinFast 第三季度亏损收窄，收入超出预期，原因是需求强劲
item.description: 越南电动汽车（EV）制造商 VinFast 周二报告称，由于材料成本降低和产量增加，第三季度净亏损较上年同期减少 5.5 亿美元。【原文：Vietnamese electric vehicle (EV) manufacturer VinFast on Tuesday reported a smaller $550 million net loss for the third quarter compared with a year earlier, helped by lower costs for materials and ramped-up production volumes.】

item.title: 拜登提议将肥胖症纳入医保范围，诺和诺德股价上涨
item.description: 丹麦减肥药生产商诺和诺德公司的股价周二上涨了1.3%，原因是美国总统乔-拜登提议扩大数百万医疗保险和医疗补助计划（Medicare and Medicaid）患者的抗肥胖药物覆盖范围。【原文：Shares of Danish weight-loss drug maker Novo Nordisk rose 1.3% on Tuesday as U.S. President Jo Biden proposed expanding coverage of anti-obesity drugs for millions on Medicare and Medicaid.】

item.title: 欧盟为国际纸业-DS 史密斯交易设定 1 月 10 日最后期限
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二提交的一份文件显示，总部位于美国的国际纸业公司（International Paper）对英国包装公司 DS Smith 58 亿英镑（72.9 亿美元）的收购将由欧盟反垄断监管机构在 1 月 10 日前做出决定。【原文：U.S.-based International Paper's 5.8-billion-pound ($7.29 billion) bid for British packaging firm DS Smith will be decided by EU antitrust regulators by Jan. 10, a European Commission filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 百思买因节假日电子产品需求疲软下调年度预期
item.description: 周二，百思买（Best Buy）下调了年度利润和销售预期，表明在电视机和家庭影院系统等高价电子产品需求低迷的情况下，假日购物季将趋于平淡。【原文：Best Buy cut its annual profit and sales forecasts on Tuesday, signaling a muted holiday shopping season amid sluggish demand for pricey electronics such as televisions and home theater systems.】

item.title: 科尔百货下调年度销售预期，原因是假日季前需求低迷
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's）周二今年第三次下调了年度销售预期，这表明该连锁百货公司正努力在优惠密集的假日购物季前吸引购物者。【原文：Kohl's cut its annual sales forecast for the third time this year on Tuesday, in a sign the department-store chain is struggling to draw in shoppers ahead of a deal-heavy holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 英国警队因内容问题悄然退出 X 平台
item.description: 路透社对英国警察部队的社交媒体产出进行的调查显示，由于对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交媒体平台助长暴力和极端内容的担忧持续存在，一些英国警察部队已基本退出了该平台。【原文：Several British police forces have largely withdrawn from Elon Musk's X social media platform as concerns over its role in promoting violence and extreme content persist, a Reuters survey of forces' social media output showed.】

item.title: 阿达尼的 "可再生能源奇迹 "深陷美国贿赂起诉案
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）在印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的清洁能源目标上大做文章，他在法国道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）和卡塔尔投资局（Qatar Investment Authority）的支持下，开始着手建设世界上最大的可再生能源项目。【原文：Betting big on the clean energy goals of Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi, billionaire Gautam Adani found backers in France's TotalEnergies and the Qatar Investment Authority as he set out to build the world's biggest renewable energy project.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称富国银行明年可能取消资产上限
item.description: 据三位熟知内情的消息人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo）在解决了假账户丑闻带来的问题后，正处于通过监管测试的最后阶段，以便在明年取消 1.95 万亿美元的资产上限。【原文：Wells Fargo is in the last stages of a process to pass regulatory tests to lift a $1.95 trillion asset cap next year after fixing problems from its fake accounts scandal, according to three sources familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 的中文在线服务将于 2026 年 3 月 31 日停止运营
item.description: 腾讯任天堂 Switch 周二表示，其中国在线服务将从 2026 年 3 月 31 日起逐步停止任天堂 eShop 的运营。【原文：Tencent Nintendo Switch said on Tuesday that its Chinese online service would gradually cease operations for the Nintendo eShop starting from March 31, 2026.】

item.title: 早间竞价特朗普关税威胁震荡加元、比索和人民币
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要或显示关于降息幅度的争论已经开始
item.description: 美联储官员表示，他们目前可能会继续降低利率，投资者仍预计他们将在美国央行12月17-18日的会议上这样做。【原文：Federal Reserve officials say they are likely to keep reducing interest rates for now, and investors still expect them to do so at the U.S. central bank's Dec. 17-18 meeting.】

item.title: 美国新的消费者保护措施开始实施，假日旅行者须知
item.description: 如果你觉得去年的假期旅行太疯狂，那就系好安全带吧。【原文：If you thought last year’s holiday travel was insane, well, buckle your seatbelt.】

item.title: 投资者权衡特朗普的关税威胁，期货走势低迷
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货持平，投资者在连续几个交易日的上涨后暂停交易，并权衡唐纳德-特朗普对主要贸易伙伴征收关税可能对当地经济产生的影响。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were flat on Tuesday, as investors paused following several sessions of gains and weighed the implications Donald Trump's tariffs on top trade partners could have on the local economy.】

item.title: 美国公司因挑战加剧而调整多元化政策
item.description: 在来自保守派团体的压力不断增加的背景下，沃尔玛成为最新一家削减一些旨在提高工作场所种族和民族代表性的多元化、公平和包容（DEI）计划的美国公司。【原文：Walmart became the latest U.S. company to cut back some diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) programs meant to boost racial and ethnic representation at workplaces against the backdrop of rising pressure from conservative groups.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称日本首相石破敦促拜登批准日美钢铁交易
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的消息人士透露，日本首相石破茂已致信美国总统拜登，请求他批准新日铁收购美国钢铁公司的交易，以免破坏两国最近为加强关系所做的努力。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba has sent a letter to President Joe Biden asking him to approve Nippon Steel's acquisition of U.S. Steel, to avoid marring recent efforts to strengthen ties between the countries, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 官员称拜登将提议扩大肥胖症药物的医疗保险和医疗补助覆盖范围
item.description: 一位白宫官员周二表示，美国总统乔-拜登将提议扩大数百万医疗保险和医疗补助计划（Medicare and Medicaid）患者的抗肥胖药物覆盖范围，这将使部分患者的自付费用减少多达 95%。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden will propose expanding coverage of anti-obesity drugs for millions on Medicare and Medicaid, which could cut out-of-pocket expenses for some by as much as 95%, a White House official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 埃克森公司高管表示，美国石油生产商不太可能转向 "钻井、宝贝、钻井 "模式
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil）的一位高管周二表示，在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的领导下，美国石油和天然气生产商不太可能大幅提高产量，因为各公司仍将专注于资本约束。【原文：U.S. oil and gas producers are unlikely to radically increase production under president-elect Donald Trump as companies remain focused on capital discipline, a senior executive at Exxon Mobil said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 东京电视台称 Fortress 看中了 Seven & i 的超市业务
item.description: 东京电视台周二在其网站上称，丰泰投资集团正在考虑从 Seven & i 控股公司手中收购伊藤洋华堂连锁超市的中间控股公司。【原文：Fortress Investment Group is considering buying an intermediate holding company that has the Ito-Yokado supermarket chain under its wing from Seven & i Holdings , TV Tokyo said on its website on Tuesday.】

item.title: 解说员：私募股权争夺富士软的背后是什么？
item.description: KKR 在与另一家私募股权投资巨头贝恩资本（Bain Capital）争夺日本小有名气的 IT 公司富士软（Fuji Soft）的过程中占据了上风。【原文：KKR has gained the upper hand in its clash with another private equity giant, Bain Capital, to take little-known Japanese IT firm Fuji Soft private.】

item.title: 美国参议院小组批评航空公司座位费上涨，将传唤高管作证
item.description: 美国参议院一个小组周二批评了航空公司不断上涨的座位分配和行李费，并将于 12 月 4 日传唤航空公司高管作证。【原文：A U.S. Senate panel on Tuesday criticized rising airline fees for seat assignments and luggage and will call air carrier executives to testify on Dec. 4.】

item.title: 美国敲定授予英特尔 78.6 亿美元芯片制造权
item.description: 美国商务部周二表示，将最终确定向英特尔提供 78.6 亿美元的政府补贴，低于 3 月份宣布的 85 亿美元，此前这家总部位于加利福尼亚州的芯片制造商赢得了五角大楼另外提供的 30 亿美元补贴。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Tuesday it was finalizing a $7.86 billion government subsidy for Intel , down from $8.5 billion announced in March after the California-based chips maker won a separate $3 billion award from the Pentagon.】

item.title: 麦格理银行因严重控制失误被英国监管机构罚款 1600 万美元
item.description: 英国金融监管机构周二对澳大利亚麦格理银行伦敦分行处以 1300 万英镑（1633 万美元）的罚款，原因是该行一名员工在 2020 年至 2022 年期间记录虚假交易并隐瞒交易损失。【原文：Britain's financial watchdog on Tuesday fined the London branch of Australian lender Macquarie Bank 13 million pounds ($16.33 million) for failings that enabled an employee to record fictitious trades and conceal his trading losses between 2020 and 2022.】

item.title: 科尔首席执行官意外离职将加剧假日购物季前的困境
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's）在公布季度业绩的前一天突然宣布首席执行官离职，这对投资者来说是个不小的打击，因为他们希望这家陷入困境的连锁百货公司能在关键的假日购物季到来之前做出积极的预测。【原文：Kohl's surprise CEO departure announcement a day before its quarterly results will play on the minds of investors, who were looking out for a positive forecast from the struggling department store chain ahead of the key holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 就业热潮让瑞士移民问题成为欧盟贸易谈判的难题
item.description: 瑞士正竭力控制来自其最大贸易伙伴欧盟的移民，因为该国的低税商业模式带动了就业热潮，使人口增长成为政治上的烫手山芋。【原文：Switzerland is scrambling to keep a lid on immigration from its top trade partner, the European Union, as a jobs boom powered by the country's low-tax business model turns population growth into a political hot potato.】

item.title: BPM 银行董事会召开会议，开始讨论联合信贷银行的收购要约
item.description: BPM 银行周二召开董事会，就竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）主动向这家意大利第三大银行提出的 100 亿欧元（105 亿美元）收购要约进行初步讨论。【原文：Banco BPM gathers its board on Tuesday for an initial discussion on the 10 billion euro ($10.5 billion) unsolicited takeover offer that rival UniCredit has launched for Italy's third-largest bank.】

item.title: 据安莎社报道，BPM 银行董事会成员称联合信贷银行的出价充满敌意
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）的一位董事会成员周二告诉意大利安莎通讯社（ANSA），联合信贷银行对意大利 Banco BPM 的出人意料的收购是充满敌意的。【原文：UniCredit's surprise bid for Italy's Banco BPM is hostile, a board member of the smaller lender told Italian newswire ANSA on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普承诺征收关税，欧洲汽车制造商业绩下滑
item.description: 周二早盘，欧洲汽车制造商股价下跌，交易商对美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普承诺对加拿大、墨西哥和中国征收巨额关税做出了反应，这一消息加剧了市场对潜在全球贸易战的担忧。【原文：European automakers shares fell in early trading on Tuesday, as traders reacted to President-elect Donald Trump pledging big tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China, news that fueled jitters over a potential global trade war.】

item.title: 投资者表示知道如何交易特朗普 2.0
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在社交媒体上承诺对墨西哥、加拿大和中国征收新的关税后，投资者们周二重新拾起了他们的贸易战战术手册，相信他们的投资组合这次能更好地应对唐纳德-特朗普。【原文：Investors dusted off their trade war playbooks on Tuesday, confident their portfolios were better-prepared for Donald Trump this time after the U.S. President-elect took to social media and pledged new tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China.】
